sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import Footer from "../Footer"; import Navbar from "../Navbar"; export default function About() { return ( <>
{/* Start Breadcrumb Area */}
  • Home
  • About Us

About Our Store

{/* End Breadcrumb Area */} {/* Start About Area */}
Founder Of Sardar Jewellers

Mr. Pravin Akbari

Mr. Pravin Mohanbhai Akbari is from very small village rinari. His father is famrer. He was started his business with silver jewellery since 1998 at kalavad. They worked in that patnership for 15 years. Today they have total 25 year very well experience. He belived in socialservice more and more.
{/* End About Area */} {/* Start About Area */} {/* End About Area */} {/* Start About Area */}

About us

Founded in 31 oct. 2012 by Sardar Jewellers. Sardar Jewellers have a more than 10 year experience and expertise in wonderful worlds of jewelry. Sardar Jewellerrs have WELL trained staff with experience of 10 year. we provide next level design for you.

Vision

Our vision is our framework that guides our business and everything about it. To Understand and delight the world, translating everyone's dream and personality into jewellery. And spread the happiness from it to all.

Mission

Every client that leaves our store knows more about jewelry because we passionately told him about it.


{/* End About Area */}
); }
